result.won:
* You WON!
* You earned {0} EXP and {1} GOLD.

fled.reward:
* Ran away with {0} EXP
  and {1} GOLD.

result.gameover:
You cannot give
up just yet...[pause][clear]{0}!
[sleep, 30]Stay determined...[pause][end]

check.0:
* Sans[sleep, 20] - 1 ATK 1 DEF[sleep, 20]
* Bro "voluntarily" become a dummy
  to serve as a test subject.
check.1:
* Sans[sleep, 20] - 2 ATK 2 DEF[sleep, 20]
* Nothing changes but this dialog.

turn.empty:
i regret to inform you
that there is no attack
for this turn[pause][clear]maybe you can make one
up yourself?
turn.0:
welcome to the engine.[pause][clear]firstly[sleep, 20], i will initiate
my infamous intro attack.[pause][clear]if you dont mind[sleep, 20],
this dialog lies within
the json file named
english.json in the
locale folder.
turn.0.1:
[sans_head, 0]i think you got
the idea from the
code how this worked
turn.1:
now[sleep, 20], i will initiate
the average bone gap
attack[pause][clear]this should be the
easiest attack for one
to code
turn.2:
next[sleep, 20], i will bring out
the blaster spam[pause][clear][sans_head, 1]it lies within the
alarm 0[sleep, 20], and it is
very fast[pause][clear][sans_head, 3]i think you will
need to adjust because
this is not going to
be [rainbow]bearable[/rainbow] at all
turn.3:
for this attack[sleep, 20], i will
spam some bone walls
along with slams which
makes it called the
bonestab attack[pause][clear]from this attack[sleep, 20], i hope
you can make these kinds
of attacks effectively
turn.4:
this is the platform
attack[pause][clear][sans_head, 1]sorry blud[sleep, 20], i know the
code is kinda horrendous
but the idea belongs
to Toby so...
turn.5:
and here[sleep, 20], the famous
blaster circle with ease
in code[pause][clear]and with this attack[sleep, 20],
the example ends here[pause][clear]enjoy the
engine experience.
[sleep, 20][rainbow]Sans out![/rainbow]

white_space.save_dialog:
* Welcome to the white space![pause][clear]* You have been living here
  as long as you can remember.[pause][clear][c_red]* It's time for a change![c_white]

dialog.introduce:
[voice, voice_sans][font_sans][portrait, spr_char_sans_expression, 0]* hi[sleep, 20], i'm funni
  skeleton man[pause][clear][portrait, spr_char_sans_expression, 5]* currently i'm stoned...[pause][clear][portrait, spr_char_sans_expression, 3]* by the way do you want
  to have a fight?

  [option, 0]Yes         [option, 1]Nuh uh[option_event, option_sans_fight_yes, option_sans_fight_nope]
dialog.weary:
[voice, voice_sans][scale, 2][font_sans][portrait, spr_char_sans_expression, 5]* aww that sad[pause][clear][portrait, spr_char_sans_expression, 3]* maybe next time?[pause][clear][portrait, spr_char_sans_expression, 1]* or until you find a way
  to do something with
  this project?[pause][end]

drop.1:
* You bid a quiet farewell
  to the {0}.

stick.name: Stick
stick.info:
* Stick - Weapon AT 0
[sleep, 20]* Its bark is worse than
  its bite.
stick.use:
* You threw the stick away.[sleep, 20]
[sleep, 20]* Then picked it back up.

bandage.name: Bandage
bandage.info:
* Bandage - Heals 10 HP
[sleep, 20]* It has already been used
  several times.

toy_knife.name: Toy Knife
toy_knife.info:
* Toy Knife - Weapon AT 3
[sleep, 20]* Made of plastic.
[sleep, 20]* A rarity nowadays.

faded_ribbon.name: Faded Ribbon
faded_ribbon.info:
* Faded Ribbon - Armor DF 3
[sleep, 20]* If you're cuter, [sleep, 20]monsters
  won't hit you as hard.

pie.name: Butterscotch Pie
pie.info:
All HP
* Butterscotch-cinnamon
  pie[sleep, 20], one slice.

noodles.name: Instant Noodles
noodles.info:
Heals HP
* Comes with everything you
  need for a quick meal!

face_steak.name: Face Steak
face_steak.info:
Heals {0} HP
* Huge steak in the shape
  of Mettaton's face.

snow.name: Snowman Piece
snow.info:
Heals {0} HP
* Please take this to the
  ends of the earth.

legendary_hero.name: Legendary Hero
legendary_hero.info:
Heals {0} HP
* Sandwich shaped like a sword.
* Increases ATTACK when eaten.

inventory.empty.0:
* You have no items.[sleep, 20]
* You put a little time into
  the box.
inventory.empty.1:
* You have no items.[sleep, 20]
* You put a little effort
  into the box.
inventory.empty.2:

* You put a little feeling
  into the box.

A name has already
been chosen.

I think you should
think of your own
name, my child.

OOOOH!!! ARE YOU
PROMOTING MY BRAND?
title.frisk:
WARNING: This name will
make your life hell.

setting.label: SETTINGS
setting.instruction: Use [Arrow Keys] or [WASD] to config the settings. Press [Enter] on the EXIT to quit.
